event.name: Atomik::Dispatch::Start
event.description: Fired at the start of the method
event.refparam: The uri that is being dispatched.
Whether pluggable applications are allowed during this dispatch.
Set to true to cancel the dispatch process. Will exit Atomik.

event.name: Atomik::Dispatch::Uri
event.description: Fired once the uri has been computed. Do not use request_uri or request config keys but the event's params.
event.refparam: The uri that is being dispatched.
Set to true to cancel the dispatch process. Will exit Atomik.

event.name: Atomik::Dispatch::Before
event.description: Fired once the request has been routed and before the call to pre_dispatch.php.
event.refparam: Set to true to cancel the dispatch process. Will exit Atomik.

event.name: Atomik::Output::Before
event.refparam: The content that will be echoed

event.name: Atomik::Output::After
event.description: Fired after content has been echoed.
event.param: The content that has been echoed

event.name: Atomik::Dispatch::After
event.description: Fired after the view (and the layout) has been rendered and before the call to pre_dispatch.php.
